title: The Goddess and the poet
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources - Australia
abstract: An old fashioned romantic who has a way with words.
description: Meet Christos Raskatos, old fashioned romantic. Meet him as a poet who has a love affair with words, as a local in love with Lorne and as a guy who catches a crayfish now and then in paradise. Interview taken at Lorne Fisheries, Lorne Pier.
